title: Lei (A)
body: The first newspaper with this title, which was published in Funchal, appeared on July 11, 1861, having given twenty-seven issues, the last being on January 25, 1862. Two other periodicals with the same title appeared later in this city, the first giving one hundred and thirty issues, from December 6, 1873 to June 20, 1877, and the second ninety-seven issues, the first being published on April 27, 1879.

1861: Start of the publication of the first newspaper with the title Lei (A)
1862: End of the publication of the first newspaper with the title Lei (A)
1873: Start of the publication of the second newspaper with the title Lei (A)
1877: End of the publication of the second newspaper with the title Lei (A)
1879: Start of the publication of the third newspaper with the title Lei (A)
